changeSet.sql: UPDATE miseq_run m SET m.layout_type="PAIRED_END" WHERE m.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT f.sequencingRun_id FROM sequence_file f INNER JOIN sequence_file_pair_files p ON f.id=p.files_id);
UPDATE miseq_run m SET m.layout_type="SINGLE_END" WHERE m.id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT f.sequencingRun_id FROM sequence_file f INNER JOIN sequence_file_pair_files p ON f.id=p.files_id);
